QuestData.Title: The Sacking of the Saberon
QuestData.Description: The stash mostly contains bits of old animal parts and other junk. Upon closer inspection there are remains of a bundle of herbs and plants.$b$bRakthoth might be more willing to help if some of these herb bundles were found and gathered for her...
QuestData.LogDescription: Find $1oa Herb Bundles in saberon stashes at Steamscar Rise.
QuestData.RewardText: So they started storing their herbs in personal stashes instead of their storage dens, good to know.$b$bYou have helped me a great deal $p.
